attributes.action: Allocate car parks for use of car enthusiasts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This has always been a problem for the goverment as they try to stamp out the so called flaws in this country. But fact remains that people are going to have hobbies that not everyone might agree with. I'm putting this petition forward to call for allocated car parks in each city for weekly use for car enthusiast "cruisers" to remove them from public roads but without disappointing anyone!
